nodes.text: Scour swarm droid was a type of droid designed by the Iokath species to clean the Chromium Garden on their artificial world of Iokath. The species went extinct following the Iokath civil war and Scour swarm droids were repurposed by the AI ARIES into the combat units, aggressive to any intruders.
Scour swarm droids appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as emenies on Iokath.
